title: Localization and the Floer homology of strongly invertible knots
abstract:
We establish two spectral sequences in knot Floer homology associated to a
directed strongly invertible knot K: one from the knot Floer homology of K to a
two dimensional vector space, and one from the singular knot Floer homology of
a singular knot associated to K to the knot Floer homology quotient knot of K.
The first of these spectral sequences is used to define a numerical invariant
of strongly invertible knots.
